name: Underhold
description:
HTML5 issue can be iffy, performance wise and with load times, download the windows version for a more stable experience :)

It’s been nearly a week since you were found lying in the Chantall forest near Fillongley village, your body broken and your memories gone.

Your recovery has been difficult and even as your body gains strength and you awaken in a strange house, your memories remain out of your grasp.

And yet you are restless…you know to recover who you were, you must return and as you wake up, you are resolved to go back. Back to the depths, of the...

UnderHold The Theme I played a bunch of gridders, blobbers, and CRPGs to preps for this, and so my implementation of the theme: Duality, is a setting reminiscent of Wizardry and MM. Controls

WASD - Move
Q/E - Turn
Left Click/Space - Interact|
Right Click - Freelook
i - Inventory

Credits

Writing/Story/Quest Design/Testing - iamabout2explode and DishonestAvo
Programming - Mag
